name: Mage
description:
Meet Mage: A novice wizard who dreams of power and respect.
He ventured into a forbidden dungeon, seeking legendary spell books locked away with the evil Lord Daos. Trapped with nothing but an insulting ghost banging around inside his brain, he has no choice but to keep moving forward and find a way out.
----------
Dungeon exploring Wizard action! Learn spells, defeat bosses and escape the evil clutches of Lord Daos in this 2D metroidvania.
